___ip.description: IP Address in decimal form of user who created the route
___ip.title: IP

___distance_unit.description: The distance measurement unit for the route
___distance_unit.title: Distance Unit

___leftturn.description: Available with: 1 = LEFTTURN_ALLOW, 2 = LEFTTURN_FORBID, 3 = LEFTTURN_MULTIAPPROACH (assumes points are intersections and visits them from all sides. Ignores uturn and leftturn constraints.)
___leftturn.title: leftturn

___limited_weight_t.description: If travel_mode = 'Trucking', specifies the truck weight (required)
___limited_weight_t.title: Limited Weight (t)

___device_id.description: 32 Character MD5 String ID of the device that was used to plan this route
___device_id.title: Device ID

___optimization_quality.description: there are 3 types of optimization qualities that are optimizations goals (1 - Generate Optimized Routes As Quickly as Possible, 2 - Generate Routes That Look Better On A Map, 3 - Generate The Shortest And Quickest Possible Routes)
___optimization_quality.title: Optimization Quality

___max_tour_size.description: Must be > 0; the maximum number of stops allowed in a subtour. null means there is no maximum
___max_tour_size.title: Maximum Tour Size

___uturn.description: Available with:1 = UTURN_DEPART_SHORTEST (Allows U-turns), 2 = UTURN_DEPART_TO_RIGHT (Forbids U-turns), 3 = UTURN_DEPART_TO_LEFT (Deprecated)
___uturn.title: uturn

___optimize.description: The driving directions will be generated biased for this selection. This has no impact on route sequencing
___optimize.title: Optimize

___lock_last.description: A flag to indicate if the last stop in the route should be fixed
___lock_last.title: Lock Last

___vehicle_max_cargo_volume.description: Max cargo volum a vehicle can cary
___vehicle_max_cargo_volume.title: Vehicle Maximum Cargo Volume

___route_time.description: Time when the route starts (relative to route_date) (Seconds). UTC timezone as well
___route_time.title: Route Time

___truck_length.description: If travel_mode = 'Trucking', specifies the truck length (required)
___truck_length.title: Truck Length

___truck_width.description: If travel_mode = 'Trucking', specifies the truck width (required)
___truck_width.title: Truck Width

___algorithm_type.description: The algorithm to be used: 1 = TSP, 2 = VRP, 3 = CVRP_TW_SD, 4 = CVRP_TW_MD, 5 = TSP_TW, 6 = TSP_TW_CR, 7 = BBCVRP, 100 = ALG_NONE, 101 = ALG_LEGACY_DISTRIBUTED
___algorithm_type.title: Algorithm Type

___vehicle_max_distance_mi.description: Max distance for a single vehicle in this route (always in miles)
___vehicle_max_distance_mi.title: Vehicle Maximum Distance (mi)

___weight_per_axle_t.description: If travel_mode = 'Trucking', specifies the weight per axle (required)
___weight_per_axle_t.title: Weight per Axle (t)

___disable_optimization.description: By disabling optimization, the route optimization engine will not resequence the stops in your
___disable_optimization.title: Disable Optimization

___is_upload.description: Let the R4M api know if this sdk request is coming from a file upload within your environment (for analytics)
___is_upload.title: Is Upload

___trailer_weight_t.description: If has_trailer = true, specifies the weight of the trailer (required)
___trailer_weight_t.title: Trailer Weight (t)

___parts.description: Legacy feature which permits a user to request an example number of optimized routes
___parts.title: Parts

___dev_lng.description: The longitude location of where a mobile device was located when it made a request to create the route
___dev_lng.title: Device Longitude

___dev_lat.description: The latitude location of where a mobile device was located when it made a request to create the route.
___dev_lat.title: Device Latitude

___travel_mode.description: The mode of travel that the directions should be optimized for
___travel_mode.title: Travel Mode

___route_max_duration.description: How many seconds a route can last at most. Default is 24 hours = 86400 seconds
___route_max_duration.title: Route Maximum Duration

___device_type.description: The type of the device that is creating this route
___device_type.title: Device Type

___subtour_max_revenue.description: Max allowed revenue from a subtour
___subtour_max_revenue.title: Subtour Max Revenue

___truck_hazardous_goods.description: Array of the truck hazardous goods
___truck_hazardous_goods.title: Truck Hazardous Goods

___route_email.description: Addresses where this route was shared after completion
___route_email.title: Route Email

___member_id.description: User ID who is assigned to the route
___member_id.title: Member ID

___route_name.description: The name of this route. this route name will be accessible in the search API, and also will be displayed on the mobile device of a user
___route_name.title: Route Name

___shared_publicly.description: Deprecated. Specify if the route can be viewed by unauthenticated users
___shared_publicly.title: Shared Publicly

___vehicle_capacity.description: How much cargo can the vehicle carry (units, e.g. cubic meters)
___vehicle_capacity.title: Vehicle Capacity

___min_tour_size.description: Must be > 0; the minimum number of stops allowed in a subtour. null means there is no minimum
___min_tour_size.title: Minimum Tour Size

___rt.description: The tour type of this route. rt is short for round trip, the optimization engine changes its behavior for round trip routes
___rt.title: Round Trip

___vehicle_max_cargo_weight.description: Max cargo weight a vehicle can cary
___vehicle_max_cargo_weight.title: Vehicle Maximum Cargo Weight

___driver_id.description: The unique internal id of a driver
___driver_id.title: Driver ID

___rightturn.description: Available with: 1 = RIGHTTURN_ALLOW, 2 = RIGHTTURN_FORBID, 3 = RIGHTTURN_MULTIAPPROACH (assumes points are intersections and visits them from all sides. Ignores uturn and leftturn constraints.)
___rightturn.title: rightturn

___route_date.description: The route start date in UTC, unix timestamp seconds. Used to show users when the route will begin, also used for reporting and analytics
___route_date.title: Route Date

___first_drive_then_wait_between_stops.description: First drive then wait between stops
___first_drive_then_wait_between_stops.title: First Drive Then Wait Between Stops

___vehicle_id.description: The unique internal id of a vehicle
___vehicle_id.title: Vehicle ID

___avoidance_zones.description: Array of the Avoidance zones IDs
___avoidance_zones.title: Avoidance Zones

___truck_height.description: If travel_mode = 'Trucking', specifies the truck height (required)
___truck_height.title: Truck Height

___avoid.description: Options which let the user choose which road obstacles to avoid. This has no impact on route sequencing
___avoid.title: Avoid

___route_type.description: Type of route being created: ENUM(api,null)
___route_type.title: Route Type
